He was last seen in mid-May.READ MORE: Daughters hit rock bottom after botched case against dad's murdererA 42-year-old man from Banksia Grove, a 40-year-old man from Attadale, and a 39-year-old woman from Attadale have each been charged with one count of murder. They were remanded in custody and will appear in court today. Selfe last came in contact with those known to him in mid-May.Major crime detectives were notified in August.DOWNLOAD THE 9NEWS APP: Stay across all the latest in breaking news, sport, politics and the weather via our news app and get notifications sent straight to your smartphone. items.title: The deadly legacy of the Hong Kong flu and its parallels to COVID-19
items.standfirst: It's been dubbed "the forgotten pandemic" — possibly because it coincided with some of the most momentous events in world history. But Dr John Gerrard argues variants of the H3N2 flu, which led to the Hong Kong flu pandemic, continue to cost lives.
items.content: It's been dubbed "the forgotten pandemic" — possibly because it coincided with some of the most momentous events in world history. But Dr John Gerrard argues variants of the H3N2 flu, which led to the Hong Kong flu pandemic, continue to cost lives.

ai_summary: The Hong Kong flu, caused by H3N2 variants, continues to cause fatalities globally.
It coincided with significant world events, potentially leading to its diminished recognition.
Dr. John Gerrard highlights the ongoing impact of the H3N2 flu strains.
The article discusses parallels between the Hong Kong flu and the COVID-19 pandemic.
The "forgotten pandemic" label reflects its historical context and impact.

clusters.title: 'High level of distrust of medical staff': Trauma remains after nurses' video
clusters.neutral_headline: Jewish Community Experiences Trauma After Nurses' Video Incident

items.title: 'High level of distrust of medical staff': Trauma remains after nurses' video
items.standfirst: Some members of Australia's Jewish community say they have experienced ongoing trauma and fear months after a video came to light that included threats to Israeli patients.
items.content: Some members of Australia's Jewish community say they have experienced ongoing trauma and fear months after a video came to light that included threats to Israeli patients.

ai_summary: Members of Australia's Jewish community report ongoing trauma and fear.

The video's emergence occurred several months prior to the article's publication.
Distrust of medical staff remains a significant issue for some community members.
The article highlights the lasting impact of the incident on the community.

clusters.title: How an email from reclusive star Kate Bush catapulted Astrid to world fame
clusters.neutral_headline: Kate Bush Email Leads to Astrid's Global Choir Fame

items.title: How an email from reclusive star Kate Bush catapulted Astrid to world fame
items.standfirst: Astrid Jorgensen has an unusual condition — she finds many human noises unbearable. So how did she end up running the "world's biggest choir"?
items.content: Astrid Jorgensen has an unusual condition — she finds many human noises unbearable. So how did she end up running the "world's biggest choir"?

ai_summary: Astrid Jorgensen runs a large choir despite finding human noises unbearable.
An email from Kate Bush played a role in Jorgensen's rise to fame.
Jorgensen's unique condition influences her approach to music and leadership.
The article explores the unexpected path to Jorgensen's global recognition.
The choir is described as one of the world's largest musical groups.

clusters.title: Antarctic and Southern Ocean security in spotlight after failed funding bid
clusters.neutral_headline: Antarctic Security Program Funding Bid Rejected Amid Geopolitical Shifts

items.title: Antarctic and Southern Ocean security in spotlight after failed funding bid
items.standfirst: A funding bid to establish a polar security research program has been knocked back, despite the changing geopolitical dynamics in Antarctica and the Southern Ocean.
items.content: A funding bid to establish a polar security research program has been knocked back, despite the changing geopolitical dynamics in Antarctica and the Southern Ocean.

The rejection occurred despite changing geopolitical dynamics in Antarctica.
The article focuses on the security implications of the region.
The Southern Ocean is also a focus of the geopolitical considerations.
The program aimed to address security concerns in the Antarctic region.

clusters.title: Fusion-power deal heralds beginning of next great energy transition
clusters.neutral_headline: Fusion Power Deal Signals Energy Transition Beginning in China

items.title: Fusion-power deal heralds beginning of next great energy transition
items.standfirst: China is driving hard to supplant the US in this new military industrial complex, and has already achieved leadership in electric vehicles, batteries, drones and renewable energy.
items.content: China is driving hard to supplant the US in this new military industrial complex, and has already achieved leadership in electric vehicles, batteries, drones and renewable energy.
